issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: TestWebHdfsTokens imports httpclient.HttpConnection, and causes unnecessary reference to httpclient. This can be removed.
fields.summary: Remove unused import of httpclient.HttpConnection from TestWebHdfsTokens.

+1 this doesn't need a full Jenkins run.

The test builds and passes with the patch so I will commit it shortly.
Committed to branch-2.7 and branch-2.7.3. Thank you for the contribution [~hanishakoneru].
Thank you [~arpitagarwal] for reviewing and committing the patch.
